Class TestServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • LimakWebApp.Utils.Controller
      • LimakWebApp.Utils.AbstractServerController
        • LimakWebApp.Tests.TestServerController

  • public class TestServerController
extends AbstractServerController

    TestServerController

    This class performs operations and some business logic for Server for test suite.

    2.09.2019

    1.0
    Author:
